AboutUs.companydescription1: It is the first professional platform where materials and work volumes in repair, construction, design, and supply fields are presented based on real market prices.
AboutUs.companydescription2: Our goal is to make real market prices easily accessible to everyone and thereby ensure transparency and accuracy in the fields of repair, construction, design, and supply.
